Module mesakit.plugins.josm.graph
Package com.telenav.mesakit.plugins.josm.graph.view

Class GraphLayer

java.lang.Object
org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.AbstractMapViewPaintable
org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.Layer
com.telenav.mesakit.plugins.josm.library.BaseJosmLayer
com.telenav.mesakit.plugins.josm.graph.view.GraphLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.openstreetmap.josm.data.projection.ProjectionChangeListener, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.MapViewPaintable, org.openstreetmap.josm.tools.Destroyable
public class GraphLayer extends BaseJosmLayer
Handles painting by rendering the graph's ViewModel on the MapCanvas using a GraphLayerRenderer to do the actual work. In addition to the loaded graph, two other decimated graphs are maintained for display when zoomed out. This makes to redraw more efficient.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
